weAre.title: Who we are
weAre.description: With luscious gardens, timeless cloister and carved wooden ceilings, this beautiful and unique 7th c. family-owned monastery is perfect for all types of smile-inducing events. The space available for rent is the cloister area plus adjoining rooms, including one with a very special carved wooden ceiling and the gardens filled with centennial trees and carpeted in pink in the Spring. A warm, spacious and beautiful setting, if we say so ourselves!

history.title: History
history.description: From luscious gardens to a timeless cloister, Mosteiro de Landim carries centuries of history and tradition.

photos.title: Photo Gallery
photos.description: Take a look yourself at some of what our history-rich spaces have to offer.

gardens.title: Gardens
gardens.description: Our renowned gardens bring life to any wedding and can be visited in tours.

services.title: Services
services.description: Get to know the services we provide for all types of smile-inducing events.

vineyards.title: Wine and Vineyard
vineyards.description: We carefully harvest and create awarded 'green' wine in our vast vineyards.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: Details on how to reach out to us and answering some of the most frequent asked questions.
